attributes.review: Iâ€™m usually not a fan of politics, but I decided to download this app because my grandpa is a fan of Donald Trump. Well, when I first opened the app, i was unpleasantly greeted by the picture of Donald Trumpâ€™s penis that he posted on Twitter a few years prior. I was HEAVILY disturbed by the photo but decided to keep investigating the app (by the way his penis is not impressive, not that it matters). Anyways, I entered my cell phone and email information in order to continue. Everything was fine, until I got a call from a random number. I usually donâ€™t answer these calls, but something told me that I needed to this time. When I picked up the phone, HILARY CLINTON answered. I was in such shock I could barely speak. Hilary continued to inform me that Donald is planning on brutally murdering each person who downloads his app and this was just a trap. Part of the reason I downloaded this was because of @unusualbeingâ€™s video about the president. Hilary told me that Donald had been watching through the camera lenses on my phone and knew that I had seen the video. He planned on later flying to my house in his magical tanning bed and decapitating me and my family and kidnapping my dogs!! I quickly thanked Hilary for her fair warning and hung up. I knew what I had to do!! I got in my car and drove so fast to Washington DC that the cops couldnâ€™t even arrest me! Once I arrived at the White House, I used my grappling hook that I had stolen from Tom Cruise during his last film of Mission Impossible and I lunged through Trumpâ€™s window with so much force that I hit his tanning bed and out he flew!! Once he saw me, he ordered his magical tanning bed to attack me!! It tried to eat me, but I smashed my foot into its mouth and knocked it off itâ€™s hinges!!! I threw Donald a towel to cover his bottom half because Iâ€™ve seen enough of his penis for one day. Then I grabbed him by his toupee and chucked him out the window so hard he crashed through the roof of Obamaâ€™s house!! Obama quickly helped me to hide the body and bury it in the White Houseâ€™s garden. And thatâ€™s how Donald Trump died. Now everyone in America lives in piece and harmony with no more corona and no more crappy presidentsğŸ˜Œ

Disgusting, my whole life has fallen apart because of this app.
